definition.name: Auto Close Org Issues
definition.description: Automatically close issues that are raised by people that belong to a specific organization

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: A GitHub API token that has permission to list org membership

inputs.name: org
inputs.description: The org to auto-close issues from

inputs.name: message
inputs.description: The comment to add when auto-closing an issue

inputs.name: keep_open
inputs.description: If any of these labels (comma-separated) are applied, the issue will not be auto-closed

evidence.reasoning: This action automates the process of closing issues based on organization membership, which relates to automation and communication through comments. It also touches on code quality by managing issues effectively.
